programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Lost Highway / Out for Murda
programme.desc: Sgt. Wedgeworth probes homeless man's I-45 murder in Harris County.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Kiss Of Death
programme.desc: In Rochester, a man from a neighboring suburb is found shot to death.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Johnny Black/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Miami's Det. Benitez investigates murder; Dallas' Det. Loboda pursues fugitive.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Heart of Gold / Last Breath
programme.desc: A 33-year-old woman collapses in the street after being stabbed multiple times.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Cold Betrayal
programme.desc: In Cleveland, a man is gunned down at home in front of his family.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty or Innocent?

programme.desc: A US veteran shoots a wanted fugitive in the back on his land.
